name: media-analysis-function
description: Lambda function to handle analysis processes.

scripts.test: env S3_BUCKET='s3-bucket' STATE_MACHINE='arn::state-machine' CONFIDENCE_SCORE=0 AWS_REGION='us-east-1' MEDIACONVERT_ROLE='MediaConvertRole' mocha lib/**/*.spec.js
scripts.build-init: rm -rf dist && rm -f archive.zip && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/lib
scripts.build:copy: cp index.js dist/ && cp -r lib dist
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
